title: Dinnerbone: 有关旁观者传送
author: cyqsimon
txt_content:
Dinnerbone: This is what the spectator menu will probably be like: http://www.gfycat.com/GreedyGreatHad…
Dinnerbone: 旁观者【传送】菜单将会长这样：http://www.gfycat.com/GreedyGreatHad…


Dinnerbone: The 'team' option will list each team, then when you select it it'll list each individual member of that team.
Dinnerbone: Team（队伍）菜单会显示出不同的队伍，然后你可以选择那个队伍里的单个玩家【进行传送】。


链接中的图片：



注：此图为GIF动图，如果加载慢请耐心等候


为何看起来和某插件这么像←_←||

replies.txt_content: 旁观者感觉很没用的样子
